Elemental Soul
Sorcerous Origin
Touched by the elements themselves, Elemental souls command the powers of the elements at their whim, absorbing elements thrown at them and unleashing great power based on their current elemental power
Your power comes from the strength of the elements.
At 1st level you learn the absorb elements spell. It does not count against your number of spells known. In addition, you can cast it by spending 1 sorcery point or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with sorcery points, the damage you take is reduced by an amount equal to your charisma modifier (after applying resistance gained by the spell) and the damage of the spell increases by an amount equal to your charisma modifier. You learn the absorb elements spell. It does not count against your number of spells known. In addition, you can cast it by spending 1 sorcery point or by expending a spell slot. If you cast it with sorcery points, the damage you take is reduced by {{Charisma:modifier}} (after applying resistance gained by the spell) and the damage of the spell increases by {{Charisma:modifier}}
At 1st level you can focus on an particular element in meditation. When you spend at least 30 Minutes in Meditation close to an element during a short or long rest you can focus on that element. Once per turn when you deal damage of the type associated with your focus element one affected creature takes an additional 1d4 damage of that type. This damage increases when you reach certain levels in this class; 1d6 at 5th level, 1d8 at 10th level, 1d10 at 14th level and 1d12 at 18th level.
